entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 this morning and minus 6 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 1 except plus 5 over eastern sections. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1 except plus 5 over eastern sections. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 19 January 2023
